checked expr   : plus<Int8, Int16>(ColumnRef(0), ColumnRef(2))

| Row 1  | 2       | 4       | 6       |
| Row 2  | 3       | 6       | 9       |

error: 
  --> SQL:1:5
  |
1 | 2.0 / 0
  |     ^ / by zero

| Domain | {2..=6} | {10..=30} | Unknown |
| Row 0  | 2       | 10        | 5       |
| Row 1  | 4       | 20        | 5       |
| Row 2  | 6       | 30        | 5       |
+--------+---------+-----------+---------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+----------------------+
| Column | Data                 |
+--------+----------------------+
| b      | Int16([2, 4, 6])     |
| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30]) |
| Output | Int32([5, 5, 5])     |
+--------+----------------------+


ast            : c div d
raw expr       : div(ColumnRef(3)::UInt32, ColumnRef(4)::Float64)
checked expr   : div<UInt32, Float64>(ColumnRef(3), ColumnRef(4))
evaluation:
+--------+-----------+------------+---------+
|        | c         | d          | Output  |
+--------+-----------+------------+---------+
| Type   | UInt32    | Float64    | Int64   |
| Domain | {10..=30} | {-20..=30} | Unknown |
| Row 0  | 10        | 10         | 1       |
| Row 1  | 20        | -20        | -1      |
| Row 2  | 30        | 30         | 1       |
+--------+-----------+------------+---------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+------------------------+
| Column | Data                   |
+--------+------------------------+
| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30])   |
| d      | Float64([10, -20, 30]) |
| Output | Int64([1, -1, 1])      |
+--------+------------------------+


ast            : c div d2
raw expr       : div(ColumnRef(3)::UInt32, ColumnRef(5)::UInt8 NULL)
checked expr   : div<UInt32 NULL, UInt8 NULL>(CAST(ColumnRef(3) AS UInt32 NULL), ColumnRef(5))
evaluation:
+--------+-----------+------------------+-------------+
|        | c         | d2               | Output      |
+--------+-----------+------------------+-------------+
| Type   | UInt32    | UInt8 NULL       | UInt32 NULL |
| Domain | {10..=30} | {0..=3} ∪ {NULL} | Unknown     |
| Row 0  | 10        | 1                | 10          |
| Row 1  | 20        | NULL             | NULL        |
| Row 2  | 30        | 3                | 10          |
+--------+-----------+------------------+-------------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Column | Data                                                                   |
+--------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30])                                                   |
| d2     | NullableColumn { column: UInt8([1, 0, 3]), validity: [0b_____101] }    |
| Output | NullableColumn { column: UInt32([10, 0, 10]), validity: [0b_____101] } |
+--------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+


error: 
  --> SQL:1:3
  |
1 | c div 0
  |   ^^^ Division by zero



ast            : (a + 3)  % b
raw expr       : modulo(plus(ColumnRef(0)::Int8, 3_u8), ColumnRef(2)::Int16)
checked expr   : modulo<Int16, Int16>(plus<Int8, UInt8>(ColumnRef(0), 3_u8), ColumnRef(2))
evaluation:
+--------+---------+---------+---------+
|        | a       | b       | Output  |
+--------+---------+---------+---------+
| Type   | Int8    | Int16   | Int32   |
| Domain | {1..=3} | {2..=6} | Unknown |
| Row 0  | 1       | 2       | 0       |
| Row 1  | 2       | 4       | 1       |
| Row 2  | 3       | 6       | 0       |
+--------+---------+---------+---------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+------------------+
| Column | Data             |
+--------+------------------+
| a      | Int8([1, 2, 3])  |
| b      | Int16([2, 4, 6]) |
| Output | Int32([0, 1, 0]) |
+--------+------------------+


ast            : a2 % 4
raw expr       : modulo(ColumnRef(1)::UInt8 NULL, 4_u8)
checked expr   : modulo<UInt8 NULL, UInt8 NULL>(ColumnRef(1), CAST(4_u8 AS UInt8 NULL))
optimized expr : modulo<UInt8 NULL, UInt8 NULL>(ColumnRef(1), 4_u8)
evaluation:
+--------+------------------+------------+
|        | a2               | Output     |
+--------+------------------+------------+
| Type   | UInt8 NULL       | UInt8 NULL |
| Domain | {1..=3} ∪ {NULL} | Unknown    |
| Row 0  | 1                | 1          |
| Row 1  | 2                | 2          |
| Row 2  | NULL             | NULL       |
+--------+------------------+------------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Column | Data                                                                |
+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| a2     | NullableColumn { column: UInt8([1, 2, 3]), validity: [0b_____011] } |
| Output | NullableColumn { column: UInt8([1, 2, 0]), validity: [0b_____011] } |
+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+


ast            : (a2 + 4) % c
raw expr       : modulo(plus(ColumnRef(1)::UInt8 NULL, 4_u8), ColumnRef(3)::UInt32)
checked expr   : modulo<UInt16 NULL, UInt32 NULL>(plus<UInt8 NULL, UInt8 NULL>(ColumnRef(1), CAST(4_u8 AS UInt8 NULL)), CAST(ColumnRef(3) AS UInt32 NULL))
optimized expr : modulo<UInt16 NULL, UInt32 NULL>(plus<UInt8 NULL, UInt8 NULL>(ColumnRef(1), 4_u8), CAST(ColumnRef(3) AS UInt32 NULL))
evaluation:
+--------+------------------+-----------+-------------+
|        | a2               | c         | Output      |
+--------+------------------+-----------+-------------+
| Type   | UInt8 NULL       | UInt32    | UInt32 NULL |
| Domain | {1..=3} ∪ {NULL} | {10..=30} | Unknown     |
| Row 0  | 1                | 10        | 5           |
| Row 1  | 2                | 20        | 6           |
| Row 2  | NULL             | 30        | NULL        |
+--------+------------------+-----------+-------------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Column | Data                                                                 |
+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| a2     | NullableColumn { column: UInt8([1, 2, 3]), validity: [0b_____011] }  |
| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30])                                                 |
| Output | NullableColumn { column: UInt32([5, 6, 0]), validity: [0b_____011] } |
+--------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+


ast            : c % (b + 3)
raw expr       : modulo(ColumnRef(3)::UInt32, plus(ColumnRef(2)::Int16, 3_u8))
checked expr   : modulo<UInt32, Int32>(ColumnRef(3), plus<Int16, UInt8>(ColumnRef(2), 3_u8))
evaluation:
+--------+---------+-----------+---------+
|        | b       | c         | Output  |
+--------+---------+-----------+---------+
| Type   | Int16   | UInt32    | UInt32  |
| Domain | {2..=6} | {10..=30} | Unknown |
| Row 0  | 2       | 10        | 0       |
| Row 1  | 4       | 20        | 6       |
| Row 2  | 6       | 30        | 3       |
+--------+---------+-----------+---------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+----------------------+
| Column | Data                 |
+--------+----------------------+
| b      | Int16([2, 4, 6])     |
| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30]) |
| Output | UInt32([0, 6, 3])    |
+--------+----------------------+


ast            : c % (d - 3)
raw expr       : modulo(ColumnRef(3)::UInt32, minus(ColumnRef(4)::Float64, 3_u8))
checked expr   : modulo<UInt32, Float64>(ColumnRef(3), minus<Float64, UInt8>(ColumnRef(4), 3_u8))
evaluation:

|        | c         | d          | Output  |
+--------+-----------+------------+---------+
| Type   | UInt32    | Float64    | Float64 |
| Domain | {10..=30} | {-20..=30} | Unknown |
| Row 0  | 10        | 10         | 3       |
| Row 1  | 20        | -20        | 20      |
| Row 2  | 30        | 30         | 3       |
+--------+-----------+------------+---------+
evaluation (internal):

| Column | Data                   |
+--------+------------------------+
| c      | UInt32([10, 20, 30])   |
| d      | Float64([10, -20, 30]) |
| Output | Float64([3, 20, 3])    |
+--------+------------------------+


error: 
  --> SQL:1:3
  |
1 | c % 0
  |   ^ Division by zero



ast            : c % d2
raw expr       : modulo(ColumnRef(3)::UInt32, ColumnRef(5)::UInt8 NULL)
checked expr   : modulo<UInt32 NULL, UInt8 NULL>(CAST(ColumnRef(3) AS UInt32 NULL), ColumnRef(5))

|        | c         | d2               | Output     |

| Type   | UInt32    | UInt8 NULL       | UInt8 NULL |

| Row 0  | 10        | 1                | 0          |
